name: Winging It (Dave Pickett, Devin Clara, Monica Fan, Pigeonkind Games, bumblebeary, Jess Elizabeth)
name_original: Winging It (Dave Pickett, Devin Clara, Monica Fan, Pigeonkind Games, bumblebeary, Jess Elizabeth)
description:
Winging It, produced during Wholesome Games Jam 2020, invites you to experience the Spring as a bluebird. Choose the material for your nest, feast on nature’s bounty in the form of seeds, berries, and worms, and participate in quintessential bird activities. Most of all, take care of your eggs to make sure they hatch safe and sound. And, remember: don’t give up!

Keyboard Controls

Return/Enter = Start
Z = Interact 
X = Jump 
Arrow Keys = Move

Credits

Design, Programming: Dave Pickett
Design, Writing: Jess Elizabeth Reed
Design, Sprite Art: Annelise Belmonte
Design, Music: Devin Clara Fanslow
Design, Sprite & Background Art: Michelle Lega
Design, Background Art: Monica Fan

Made with: GB Studio
